attributes.action: All hospitality staff,who paid tax for last 3 year must be paid furlough by HMRC
attributes.additional_details: We must be paid via HMRC average pay of all employee who paid at least tax means those earned above 12500. It's means those employees paid tax in each calender year.
attributes.background: We are contributing good tax via our pay and we want in hard time we must be paid to look after our family. We already lost jobs in July as employer can't pay event 5% from pocket as no business.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you want furlough payments, for people who are temporarily unable to work, or for payments for people who have been made redundant during the pandemic. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
